title: Is Cupping (Hijama) a form of worship? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: is copping a form of worship the answer is yes it's a Sunnah that the Prophet had done erased a lot of Silla if you don't have any medical need for it but you simply do it for the sake of following the Sunnah of the Prophet Allah so Sarah you will be rewarded for that insha'Allah
